page.title: 17LEVERTON FIRE STATION 2
page.content: If only 3 men turn out they press 1 on the cyfas box then press the send button.Then when they're at the job press 2 then press the send button.The buttons 3 and 4 are not used on this call.When they get to stand_by station press 5 and then the send button.Then they have to press C 1 5, C=Boston 1=Boston Station and 5=Stand_by.Then press 6 and the send button, then press all the buttons again.All this goes to Lincoln into the computer there.This machine is called a cyfas. The fire engine has 2 airhorns at the top and 2 at the bottom.Roger Needam is station officer so you say Needam CL.The bottles at the back contain compressed air, when they reach below 160 degrees they fill up again.
